approach.description: Describes the approach used in the ALD process, e.g., thermal or plasma-enhanced.

dataOrigin.description: Source of the data used in the process description.

methodology.description: Information about the methodology and data source used in the ALD process.

metalPrecursor.description: Metal precursor used in the ALD process, e.g., HfCl4.

oxygenSource.description: Oxygen source used in the ALD process, e.g., H2O.

purpose.description: Purpose of the additional precursor in the ALD process.

additionalPrecursors.description: List of additional precursors used in the ALD process.

precursors.description: Details about the precursors used in the ALD process.

substrate.description: Type of substrate used, e.g., hydroxylated SiO2.

inputParameters.description: Input parameters for the ALD process.

reactionPathway.description: Description of the initial growth reactions of the film, including half-reactions of HfCl4 and H2O.

energyProfile.description: Energy profile for the reaction pathway.

initialGrowthReactions.description: Details of the initial growth reactions in the ALD process.

surfaceOHGroupConcentration.description: Surface concentration of OH groups before the reaction, influencing the growth-per-cycle.

reactionMechanisms.description: Details about the reaction mechanisms in the ALD process.

uniformity.description: Describes the uniformity of the film deposited by the ALD process.

roughness.description: Describes the roughness of the film surface.

density.description: Describes the density of the film.

chemicalComposition.description: Detailed elemental analysis of the film.

growthPerCycle.description: The thickness of the film deposited per cycle, influenced by chemisorption and steric hindrance.

filmProperties.description: Observable properties of the film produced by the ALD process.

simulationResults.description: Results from simulations and experimental observations in the ALD process.

geometry.description: Description of the reactor geometry, including the arrangement and dimensions of inlets and outlets.

gapDistance.description: Distance between the substrate and the precursor inlet.

gasFlowRates.description: Gas flow rates in the reactor.

substrateVelocity.description: Velocity of the substrate during the deposition process.

reactorDesign.description: Design parameters of the reactor used in the ALD process.
